com.bienmesabe.rest.service

Interface RecipeService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RecipeServiceImpl

    public interface RecipeService
    Inteface with the service methods to retrive the recipes
    Version:
    11/04/2021
    Author:
    RAUL RAMOS CENDRERO

    • Method Detail

      • getAllRecipes

        List<Recipe> getAllRecipes()
        Method to recover the recipes
        Returns:
        a list with the recipes

      • getAllRecipesByAssessment

        List<Recipe> getAllRecipesByAssessment()
        Method to recover the recipes present in the DB ordered by assessment
        Returns:
        a list with the recipes in the DB ordered by assessment

      • getRecipeByIngredients

        List<Recipe> getRecipeByIngredients(String ingredientsForFilter)
        Method to recover the ingredient by ingredients
        Parameters:
        ingredientsForFilter - list with the ingredients that must have the recipe
        Returns:
        a list with the recipes filtered by ingredients

      • getRecipeByKCal

        List<Recipe> getRecipeByKCal(int kcalMin,
                             int kcalMax)
        Method to recover the recipes by kcal range
        Parameters:
        kcalMin - integer that represents the mimimum kcal of the recipe to search
        kcalMax - integer that represents the maximum kcal of the recipe to search
        Returns:
        a list with the recipes filtered by kcal range

      • getRecipeByType

        List<Recipe> getRecipeByType(int type)
        Method to recover the recipes by type
        Parameters:
        type - integer that represents the type of the recipe to search
        Returns:
        a list with the recipes filtered by type

      • getRecipesByDinners

        List<Recipe> getRecipesByDinners(int dinners)
        Method to recover the recipes by dinners
        Parameters:
        dinners - integer that represents the dinners of the recipe to search
        Returns:
        a list with the recipes filtered by dinners

      • getRecipesByFilters

        List<Recipe> getRecipesByFilters(String data)
        Method to recover the recipes by the filters recived by parameter
        Parameters:
        data - string with the filters
        Returns:
        a list with the recipes filtered by the filtered recived by parameter

      • getRecipeById

        Recipe getRecipeById(Long id)
        Method to recover the recipe by id
        Parameters:
        id - long that represents the id of the recipe to search
        Returns:
        the recipe filtered by id

      • getRecipesOfUser

        List<Recipe> getRecipesOfUser(Long userId)
        Method to recover the recipes of the user
        Parameters:
        userId - long that represents the id of the user that creates the recipes
        Returns:
        a list with the recipes in the DB filtered by user id

      • getRecipesOfOtherUsers

        List<Recipe> getRecipesOfOtherUsers(Long userId)
        Method to recover the recipes of the other users
        Parameters:
        userId - long that represents the id of the user wich doesn't create the recipes
        Returns:
        a list with the recipes in the DB filtered by user id

      • getRecipesNotActive

        List<Recipe> getRecipesNotActive()
        Method to recover the recipes that are not active
        Returns:
        a list with the recipes that are not active

        Long createRecipe(Recipe recipe)
        Method to create a recipe
        Parameters:
        recipe - object that represents the recipe to persist
        Returns:
        a long with the id of the persisted recipe

        void modifyRecipe(Recipe recipe)
        Method to modify an recipe
        Parameters:

      • updateImageRecipePath

        boolean updateImageRecipePath(String path,
                              long recipeId)
        Method to update the image path of a recipe in the table recipes of the DB
        Parameters:
        path - string with the path of the recipe image
        recipeId - long that represents the id of the recipe
        Returns:
        a boolean that represents if the path of the recipe image has been successfully updated or not

      • setRecipeAsActive

        boolean setRecipeAsActive(Long id)
        Method to asign a recipe as active
        Parameters:
        id - long that represents the id of the recipe
        Returns:
        a boolean that indicates if the recipe has been successfully set as active or not

      • deleteRecipeById

        void deleteRecipeById(long id)
        Method to delete an recipe
        Parameters:
        id - long with the id of the recipe to delete
